text: there are just some things you don't
want people to know you're googling
your online searching can open a
seriously personal window into your life
whenever you do a search the search
company can see what you're doing and
whenever you click on a result or an ad
those third-party sites can see not only
what you searched for but also your IP
address that means they know what you're
searching for and they know who you are
and that is not cool here's how to
search securely without everybody
knowing about it
now most browsers have some sort of an
incognito or a private mode built in
this does offer some protection but it's
not quite enough trust me if you really
want to search without leaving any trace
at all start with a private search
engine like DuckDuckGo com its privacy
policy says that it does not collect or
share personal information and that's
pretty much it
a couple other private search engine
options are privately com or X quick
comm which is based in the Netherlands
so they say that they're not under US
jurisdiction and can't ever be forced to
turn over any information at all
now these search engines do take a
little bit of getting used to
they don't autocomplete for you and they
don't suggest results based on things
that you've clicked on in the past so
you might find at first that you have to
do a little more work or be more
specific or that the results don't seem
quite as accurate so if you want to keep
using the search engines that you
already know and love but more securely
that's where disconnect search comes in
disconnect search works in a couple of
ways there's a web-based option at
search dot disconnect me when you get
there there's a drop down menu that lets
you search Google Bing Yahoo and it even
includes some others like DuckDuckGo and
Blekko all the searching is secure and
no history is saved you can also install
disconnect search as a plug-in for your
browser which is actually my favorite
way to use it and there's a new app
available for Android but sadly not for
iOS so there you have it no more ads for
acne remedies or cellulite cream no more
search history lurking out there like a
time bomb I mean we all have our
problems but they don't need to know
about
Oh
